```{r}
data(pbc)
pbc$exp_percentile <- runif(nrow(pbc), 0, 1)
pbc$ageGroup <- ifelse(pbc$age < 20, 1,
                ifelse(pbc$age >= 20 & pbc$age < 40, 2,
                ifelse(pbc$age >= 40 & pbc$age < 80, 3,
                ifelse(pbc$age >= 80, 4, NA))))
```
